text: Joey is so patient and friendly. Thumb up for the great customer service. Merry Christmas to all!

Very friendly customer service and helpful too ! I remember there was a very tall girl very talkative but not sure whats her name but shout out to her!!!
Love it ðŸ˜»

Great range of earrings, necklaces and rings to choose from, yet easy to form sets of the same design. Nicole was very helpful in recommending the designs that would be suitable for the recipients i had in mind. She was attentive, patiently answered all my queries while allowing me to take my time to browse.

I went in to browse and was warmly greeted by one of the sales assistants, April. She was incredibly helpful, assisting me with selecting and trying on items while also recommending some designs. I really appreciate her patience and accommodating approach.
Happy to shop at this place as they have waterproof selection of costume jewelleries amd lots of pretty stuff here. More important very polite and great staff service!!
